br.span: Among many achievements, Quarry Hill Community School jumped from 10% to 74% accountability in a single year! That meansÂ
br.strong: we performed better than 74% of all Elementary and Middle Schools IN THE STATE!
br.span: Â 95% of Monson High School students are advanced / proficient in English, and ALL STUDENTS at Granite Valley exceeded Science expectations. For the full report, please visit the 2018 MCAS Results link under our Parent Resources tab.Â
